resources: "Success." "Unknown error." "Server is rebooting for maintanence." "Obsolete version. Please update this app." "Error communicating with server." "User not found." "User offline." "User already exist." "Already logged in." "Login required." "Incorrect password." "Incorrect SMS code." "User not fully configured." "Phone number not configured." "If you changed your phone number then its is necessary to update Settings->Phone number settings." "Base language not configured" "Awaiting for phone number confirmation." "Too many attempts to confirm phone number. Temporarily blocked." "Aborted processing of unknown call." "Call already exist." "Wrong call state." "Low balance.
